rotatingIcons.title: Explore the world with Raven Road
rotatingIcons.subheader: AI navigation that guides you wherever you are

infoContainer2.header: Raven Road ‚Äì Your New Favorite Navigation App
infoContainer2.description: Raven Road is a modern navigation app that takes route planning to the next level. With innovative use of artificial intelligence, you can forget about tedious manual planning of your trips. Just describe what your route should look like, and our AI will generate it for you. You can overlay the ready route on the map and use it in navigation immediately.

features.aiRoutes: üí° AI-generated intelligent routes ‚Äì Create unique journeys tailored to your preferences.

infoContainer2.footer: Shaping the Future of Navigation Together. Raven Road is more than just an app ‚Äì it's a community of users who have a real impact on its development. Join our journey and help us create the perfect navigation tool.

feature1.title: What is Raven Road
feature1.text: Welcome to Raven Road, a versatile platform for motorcycle enthusiasts! Whether you're planning an adventurous journey, tracking your routes, or connecting with fellow riders, Raven Road has everything you need. Our interactive maps and GPS navigation help you discover and share exciting routes, while real-time tracking keeps you connected with friends. Join challenges, explore popular trails, and become part of a vibrant community. Raven Road - your journey begins here, and every ride turns into an adventure!

whatRR.heading: Raven Road - Your indispensable travel companion

feature2.title: Interactive Maps and GPS Navigation
feature2.text: Create, save, and share motorcycle routes using advanced maps. Use GPS navigation with voice instructions to reach your destination safely.

feature3.title: Tracking and Ride Analysis
feature3.text: Record your rides, analyze statistics, and share your achievements. Track your location in real-time and see where your friends are.

feature4.title: Community and Challenges
feature4.text: Join challenges and compete with other riders. Discover popular routes, share your adventures, and be part of a dynamic motorcycle community.

ad.title: Advertising in the Raven Road app
ad.text: If you're thinking about promoting your business in the Raven Road app, write to us at:
ad.contact: We will be happy to answer any questions!

blackFeather.line3: - Route planning for a specific day

features.heading: Step into the future with Raven Road!

aiRouteCreation.title: AI Route Creation
aiRouteCreation.text: In the Raven Road app, AI will help you create personalized motorcycle routes.

socialMediaIntegration.title: Social Media Integration
socialMediaIntegration.text: Easily share your rides, photos, and stats on social media platforms to inspire others and build your motorcycle community.

safetyAlerts.title: Safety and Alerts
safetyAlerts.text: Use alert features and notifications about hazardous conditions on the route to ride more safely and avoid potential dangers.

offlineMode.title: Offline Mode
offlineMode.text: Navigate and track your routes even without Internet access, thanks to the ability to download maps and routes to your device.

info.tagline: Explore the world with cutting-edge AI navigation technology
info.description: Raven Road is more than just navigation. Thanks to advanced artificial intelligence technology, our app customizes routes to your preferences, suggests local attractions, and reacts to changing road conditions. Wherever you're headed, Raven Road will get you there with confidence and comfort.

intelligentRoutes.title: Intelligent Routes
intelligentRoutes.text: Optimize routes based on your preferences and driving style.

realtimeNotifications.title: Real-Time Notifications
realtimeNotifications.text: Instant updates about traffic jams and disruptions.

exploreSurroundings.title: Explore Surroundings
exploreSurroundings.text: Discover attractions, restaurants, and other places of interest.

getStarted.step1: Download the app to your phone and create an account.
getStarted.step2: Set your travel preferences, such as route type and notifications.
getStarted.step3: Start planning your route and discover new places!

info.startButton: Start your journey with Raven Road

possibility.title: The possibilities are endless
possibility.description: Discover the capabilities of Raven Road and plan a route like never before

footer.heading: Are you ready for your journey into the future?
